name: part_008
file: tmp_舞台 「尾丸ポルカ」～あゝ素晴らしきアイドル人生かな～【#尾丸ポルカ2周年】 [jEaTxwIKamw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Yaneura no Epilogue'.
A major announcement followed by the performance of the song 'Saikyouchic Polka'.
End credits roll with a voiceover monologue by Omaru Polka.
Final talk session in a theater setting.

subtitles.original: ...眠れぬ夜で
subtitles.english: ...on sleepless nights,

subtitles.original: いくつもの 場面 数え 微笑む
subtitles.english: I count so many scenes and smile.

subtitles.original: ホログラムで できた夢
subtitles.english: A dream made of holograms...

subtitles.original: 目でも 確かに 触れる 想いで
subtitles.english: ...with feelings that I can surely see and touch.

subtitles.original: だから 流れ星に 詰めた 願い事
subtitles.english: So, the wish I put into a shooting star,

subtitles.original: また ここで みんなで 歩めますように
subtitles.english: is that we can all walk together here again.

subtitles.original: 繋がってく 夢の途中
subtitles.english: In the middle of a connecting dream,

subtitles.original: 未来への 想いを なんて
subtitles.english: holding onto feelings for the future,

subtitles.original: おやすみ
subtitles.english: goodnight.

subtitles.original: 重大発表
subtitles.english: Major Announcement

subtitles.original: サイキョウチックポルカ
subtitles.english: Saikyouchic Polka

subtitles.original: 見逃さないで これが私の流儀
subtitles.english: Don't miss it, this is my style!

subtitles.original: 勘違いされたら そりゃまあやっぱ凹むよ
subtitles.english: If I'm misunderstood, well, I'll definitely be down.

subtitles.original: 君のことが 好きで
subtitles.english: Because I love you!

subtitles.original: 歩み寄って神回避 ちょうどしたかった思い
subtitles.english: Stepping closer, a god-tier dodge, the feeling I just wanted to express.

subtitles.original: ハート揺れるあの子が どこに居ても目立っちゃう
subtitles.english: That girl who makes hearts flutter stands out wherever she is!

subtitles.original: サイキョウチックポルカ
subtitles.english: Saikyouchic Polka!

subtitles.original: 21:00 プレミア公開
subtitles.english: 21:00 Premiere Release

subtitles.original: はぁ... はぁ... どこだっけ？ちょっと待って
subtitles.english: *pant* *pant* Where was it? Wait a second.

subtitles.original: あ、違うな絶対。えーと... つかっ、はぁ...
subtitles.english: Ah, that's definitely wrong. Let's see... I mean, *pant*...

subtitles.original: あ！はい、もう一回行きます！
subtitles.english: Ah! Okay, let's go one more time!

subtitles.original: 最高！もうステージは始まってんだぜ！あれ？待って。は？はぁー！
subtitles.english: Awesome! The stage has already started! Wait, what? Huh? Haaa!

subtitles.original: ってサイリウムを、わぁー！って振って分かってくれる？
subtitles.english: Can you understand if I wave the glowsticks like, 'Waaa!'?

subtitles.original: わぁー！おー、いいね、いいね。お！わぁー！すごいすごいすごい！
subtitles.english: Waaa! Oh, nice, nice. Oh! Waaa! Amazing, amazing, amazing!

subtitles.original: おお、ポルカより飛んでるよそれ。やばくね？
subtitles.english: Whoa, that's flying higher than Polka. Isn't that crazy?

subtitles.original: あ、君追っかけるから。だから君わぁー！って走って、ちゃんと、ちゃんとこう行かないとだめだからね
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll chase you. So you run like, 'Waaa!', and you have to go properly, okay?

subtitles.original: あ、そうそうそうそう。危ないから、その外れたりするとさ、落ちちゃったりすると危ないから
subtitles.english: Ah, right, right, right. It's dangerous, if you go off track and fall, it's dangerous.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと前見てね、こうやって。前、前、前、大丈夫？あ、あ、ああーっ
subtitles.english: Look straight ahead, like this. Front, front, front, you okay? Ah, ah, aaaaah!

subtitles.original: チャンネル登録者数100万人 ありがとう!!!
subtitles.english: My channel's reached 1 million subscribers! THANK YOU!!!

subtitles.original: My channel's reached 1 million subscribers! THANKS!!!
subtitles.english: My channel's reached 1 million subscribers! THANKS!!!

subtitles.original: 皆様、今回は尾丸ポルカ2周年配信を最後までご覧いただきありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you very much for watching Omaru Polka's 2nd Anniversary stream until the end.
